no patriceok1: Oh, well then yes, Wine is a program inside Linux, that emulates the windows API so things can run on linux
the reason windows apps cant run in unix are because they are windows API specific or have windows specific resources (dlls' etc)
WINE reemulates the C drive and registry
and you can even make things work under wine by adding resources yourself.
